name: The Last Shift
description:
The Last Shift is a short horror game about working alone in an office when weird things start happening. Game Info

You will play as a game designer at a small game studio based in California, USA on his late shift. You have to print the report for today but weird things start happening. Will you have the courage to work alone in the office?

Controls W A S DMoveSpaceJumpShiftSprintLMB (Left Mouse Button )InteractRMB (Right Mouse Button)Get up from the computerFFlashlight Credits

Programming, Visuals, Level design and Project made by Tudypie

Follow me on twitter here

3D Models :

Snaps Prototype | Office - Asset Store Originals

JustCreate - Low Poly House Interior

Additional Info

This game was made in a week. Any feedback is appreciated :)

IMPORTANT If you are playing the game on a wide monitor or on a 4:3 monitor the UI will not appear correctly! I am sorry for that!

If you want to support me in making more indie horror games you can donate here: Buy Me a Coffee
